name: oneasean-teams-docs
description: Microsoft Teams onboarding documentation for Messer ASEAN

scripts.health: node -e "const http = require('http'); const options = { hostname: 'localhost', port: process.env.PORT || 3000, path: '/health', method: 'GET' }; const req = http.request(options, (res) => { if (res.statusCode === 200) { console.log('✓ Application health check passed'); process.exit(0); } else { console.log('✗ Application health check failed'); process.exit(1); } }); req.on('error', () => { console.log('✗ Application is not running'); process.exit(1); }); req.end();"

author: Messer ASEAN
